729546f-b.title: Richmond: Maryland Avenue - Fox Hill Terrace
729546f-b.text:
(1)
Rosebank, Staten lIsland: A panoramio view across the village, toward the Upper Bay, seen from Maryland Avenue and Fox Hill Terrace. On the right can be seen the steeple of St. Marys R.C. Church, on Bay Street; in the center is a
TE3EYTNC::5.T.1Y'128R08R~~N4SR9
P. L. Sperr  January 18, 1931
(2)
Another view across Rosebank, in the same general direction as seen from Maryland and Wermont Avenues. In the center of the view is Public School No. 13, on Hyland Boulevard and Anderson Street; preceding the school is the Hylan Boulevard bridge over the Staten Island tracks; to the right of the church spire are two stacks of the Wrigley chewing Eum plant, and running from left to right, in the foreground, is Maryland Avenue; running perpendicular to the latter and
the Boulevard is Vermont Avenue.
P. L. Sperr  February 2, 1931
729546f-b.folder: Maryland Avenue & Fox Hill Terrace, Staten Island, NY
